description: Ms. codex. Manuscript erroneously foliated beginning on the fourth leaf. Record follows erroneous foliation. Physical description: 21 lines per page; written in naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Catchwords. Some damp-staining and a few repairs. Covers are detached. Origin: 19th century.
abstract: Collection of texts on Shiʻite law.
contents: 6. fol. 94b-177b: Ghunyah / Ḥamzah ibn ʻAlī ibn Zuhrah.
title: Masāʼil wa-rasāʼil min Muhannā ibn Sinān ... [etc.].
subject: Manuscripts, Arabic—New Jersey—Princeton
call_number: Oversize Islamic Manuscripts, New Series no. 960q
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
